Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl, a petty criminal, is hit by a car and loses his $100,000 lottery ticket. Drugged, he signs divorce papers. He now believes in Karma and makes a lists of wrongs to right, starting with Kenny.

Episodes.Title: Quit Smoking
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Randy and Catalina try to get Earl to cross "quit smoking" off the list. They also take him to Donny Jones, who did 2 years for a crime done by Earl. Joy tries to kill Earl to inherit the money.

Episodes.Title: Randy's Touchdown
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: To cross yet another injustice off his list, Earl vows to get his brother Randy the football touchdown denied to him in high school.

Episodes.Title: Faked My Own Death
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl once faked his own death to get out of a relationship. Now he wants to come clean and tell the girl about his deceit.

Episodes.Title: Teacher Earl
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl wants to make up for making fun of people with an accent by teaching English to immigrants.

Episodes.Title: Broke Joy's Fancy Figurine
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl wants to make up for breaking Joy's fancy figurine by replacing it. However, it can't be bought because it's a prize in mother and daughter beauty contest.

Episodes.Title: Stole Beer from a Golfer
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl's efforts to undo all of the damage he did to one man's life upsets Randy, who desperately wants to go to the county fair.

Episodes.Title: Joy's Wedding
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl talks Joy into letting him set up a new wedding with Darnell after ruining their last one, but he only makes things worse by sleeping with her before the wedding.

Episodes.Title: Cost Dad the Election
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl convinces his dad to run for mayor again and tries to help, so that he can make up for ruining his last election.

Episodes.Title: White Lie Christmas
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Joy convinces Earl to pretend that they're still married while her parents visit for Christmas. But Earl discovers that Joy's mom is hiding an even bigger lie.

Episodes.Title: Barn Burner
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl has to make up for burning down a barn at a boys' camp when he was a kid. But he later finds out that he's not the one who burned the barn down.

Episodes.Title: O Karma, Where Art Thou?
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl works as a fast-food clerk for a week for a man he stole a wallet from. While he's there, he discovers that his new boss seems to be immune to bad karma--he's a total jerk but lives a charmed life.

Episodes.Title: Stole P's HD Cart
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl returns a hot dog cart which he once stole to its rightful owner. However, his buddy Ralph manages to set it on fire, forcing Earl and his 'gang' to break into the town hall to make things right.

Episodes.Title: Monkeys in Space
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl struggles to give his recently incarcerated friend the perfect day in order to cross him off his list; meanwhile, Randy tries to find his purpose in life.

Episodes.Title: Something to Live For
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl takes his car troubles as a sign that it is time for him to redeem himself for a long run of stealing gas out of a complete stranger's car.

Episodes.Title: The Professor
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl neglects the list while he hangs out with a sexy psychology professor who is fascinated with concept of karma. But as a result of blowing off his list, karma catches back up with him.

Episodes.Title: Didn't Pay Taxes
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to make up for not paying taxes his whole life. Unfortunately, the Government is not interested in his money, so he has to figure out another way to pay the money back.

Episodes.Title: Dad's Car
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Barbie Adler, Brad Copeland
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl tries to make up for losing his dad's Mustang in a drag race when he was a kid.

Episodes.Title: Y2K
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Earl tries to return a take-a-number machine to a department store, it triggers back memories of when the gang moved into the department store on 1/1/2000--thinking that they were the only people alive in town after Y2K.

Episodes.Title: Boogeyman
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: When Earl decides to cross off "made a kid scared of the boogeyman" from his list, he discovers just what kind of lasting affect he had on the little boy.

Episodes.Title: The Bounty Hunter
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: The girl Earl dumped for Joy years earlier has become a bounty hunter and tries to track Joy down. Earl feels responsible for the mess, until Joy tells him how they really hooked up.

Episodes.Title: Stole a Badge
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl must return a police badge he once found and used for his own benefit, to the officer who lost it.

Episodes.Title: BB
Episodes.Writer: Gregory Thomas Garcia, Kat Likkel, John Hoberg
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl finds out that by accidentally shooting a young girl with a BB gun, he has caused an argument between her and her father. It will take all his energy and patience to get father and daughter to reconcile again.

Episodes.Title: Number One
Episodes.Actors: Jason Lee, Ethan Suplee, Jaime Pressly
Episodes.Plot: Earl finds out that a guy he stole money from was going to use the money to buy the winning lottery ticket. So he returns the money to him, which makes Randy very angry.
